Free Art Buffet

𝙅𝙪𝙨𝙩 𝙚𝙭𝙥𝙧𝙚𝙨𝙨 𝙮𝙤𝙪𝙧𝙨𝙚𝙡𝙛!

Posted by Art Club on August 15, 2021

Register Now!



我哋係9月會有兩次嘅free art buffet，大家18/8開始一連兩個禮拜都可以係Google form到reg🤩

We will have 2 free art buffets in September! Students can start register from 18/8~ 31/8 via Google forms 🤩

⬇️⬇️⬇️⬇️⬇️⬇️⬇️⬇️⬇️⬇️

詳程 (Details):

日期 (Date): 6/9 & 14/9

時間(Time): 18:30~20:30

地點(Venue): Art Studio, HKU

名額(Quota): 12 participants

費用(Fee): member $0；non-member $40


🌈🌈🌈🌈🌈🌈🌈🌈🌈🌈🌈🌈🌈

Free art buffet 係我地Art Club 每個月都會舉辦嘅恆常活動🤩 我哋提供一個舒適嘅環境俾大家係度進行創作～🤤🤤 同學可以用我哋Art studio入面嘅一切資源嚟創作自己獨一無二嘅畫作❣大家可以係度揮灑創意，享受創作嘅快樂😍😆仲可以識到一班一樣中意畫畫嘅志同道合，一齊交流心得🤓

Free art buffet is a recurring activity of Art Club, held on a monthly basis 🤩 We provide a warm & cozy atmosphere for you to design and make art❣ Students can use all the materials provided in the Art Studio to create their own masterpieces 😍🤤 Here, you can unleash your creativity and joy through drawing. You can also meet new friends and inspire one another! 🤓

🌈🌈🌈🌈🌈🌈🌈🌈🌈🌈🌈🌈🌈

我哋會提供包括塑膠彩，油彩，水彩，廣告彩，木顏色，畫筆，畫板同埋畫紙等🖌️🖍️📏🎨仲有其他唔同嘅物料俾大家🥳🙆🏻‍♀️

Materials provided: acrylic paint, oil paint, watercolor paint, poster color paint, pastels, paintbrushes, canvas, palette, painting paper, etc.

🌈🌈🌈🌈🌈🌈🌈🌈🌈🌈🌈🌈🌈


＊非會員繳費後即時成為Art Club 會員＊

* Non-members will become Art Club member automatically upon payment of fee *

＊如報名人數過多，名額將以抽籤形式分配＊

* Drawing lots principle shall be used if the number of applicants exceeds the quota*

如有任何查詢，歡迎係ig 或者facebook dm我哋或者電郵至artclubhkusu@gmail.com

If you have any enquiries, feel free to contact us through social media (IG or Facebook) or send an email to artclubhkusu@gmail.com
